SELECT /* StoreInspectionScheduleMapper.selectInspectorList 원승언 */ DISTINCT MB.MBR_NM || '(' || MB.MBR_NO || ')' AS inspMbrNm FROM INSP_SCHD INSC INNER JOIN STORE ST ON INSC.STORE_ID = ST.STORE_ID INNER JOIN MBR MB ON ST.INSP_MBR_ID = MB.MBR_ID INNER JOIN MBR MB2 ON ST.SV_MBR_ID = MB2.MBR_ID
MB.MBR_STTS_CD ='1'
AND MB2.MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{svMbrNo} )
AND MB2.MBR_ID = (SELECT DISTINCT SV_MBR_ID FROM STORE WHERE INSP_MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO= #{inspMbrNo} ) )

SELECT /* StoreInspectionScheduleMapper.selectInspectionType 원승언 */ DISTINCT CASE WHEN INSP_TYPE_CD = 'IT001' THEN '제품점검' WHEN INSP_TYPE_CD = 'IT002' THEN '위생점검' WHEN INSP_TYPE_CD = 'IT003' THEN '정기점검' WHEN INSP_TYPE_CD = 'IT004' THEN '비정기점검' WHEN INSP_TYPE_CD = 'IT005' THEN '기획점검' END AS INSP_TYPE_CD FROM INSP_SCHD INSC INNER JOIN INSP_PLAN INPL ON INPL.INSP_PLAN_ID = INSC.INSP_PLAN_ID INNER JOIN CHKLST CH ON CH.CHKLST_ID = INPL.CHKLST_ID INNER JOIN STORE ST ON ST.STORE_ID = INSC.STORE_ID INNER JOIN MBR MB ON MB.MBR_ID = ST.INSP_MBR_ID INNER JOIN MBR MB2 ON MB2.MBR_ID = ST.SV_MBR_ID
CHKLST_USE_W = 'Y' AND INSP_PLAN_USE_W = 'Y'
AND MB2.MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{svMbrNo} )
AND MB2.MBR_ID = (SELECT DISTINCT SV_MBR_ID FROM STORE WHERE INSP_MBR_ID = (SELECT MBR_ID FROM MBR WHERE MBR_NO= #{inspMbrNo} ) )
ORDER BY INSP_TYPE_CD
